sentences.en: All shades of mauve, lilac, lavender and purple were fashionable.
sentences.cn: 深深浅浅的各种木槿色、丁香色、熏衣草色和紫色都是流行色。

sentences.en: And not one involves lavender candles.
sentences.cn: 这可不需要点薰衣草蜡烛。

sentences.en: Double lavender rose. Variegated green and white. Standard trailer.
sentences.cn: 重瓣紫到玫瑰色花. 绿色和白色组合的斑叶. 标准悬垂型.

sentences.en: Function: Remove comedo and dead cell , Oil control, Lavender disinfect & sterilize .
sentences.cn: 功效: 清除脸部的黑头、角质 、 控制油脂的分泌、收缩毛孔, 消毒 杀菌.

sentences.en: I was sitting outside, breathing in the scent of roses and lavender.
sentences.cn: 当时我正在屋外呼吸玫瑰和熏衣草的芳香.

sentences.en: Ingredient: Acorus gramineus Soland, mint leaves, masson pine, lavender etc.
sentences.cn: 主要成分: 石菖蒲 、 薄荷叶 、 马尾松 、 薰衣草等.

sentences.en: Ingredient: Acorus gramineus Soland, mint leaves, masson pine, lavender, carrageenan bead etc.
sentences.cn: 主要成分: 石菖蒲 、 薄荷叶 、 马尾松 、 薰衣草 、 卡拉胶珠等.

sentences.en: Ingredient: DNA Fluid, Lavender, Hamamelis, Elastic Element, Micro - collagen Protein, Hair Follicle Mollify.
sentences.cn: 主要成份: DNA原液 、 薰衣草 、 金缕梅 、 弹力素 、 微胶原蛋白 、 毛囊软化剂.

sentences.en: It was colored a deep lavender - blue .
sentences.cn: 它给染上了浓浓的 青莲色.

sentences.en: It was gas blue with lavender beads.
sentences.cn: 衣服是淡蓝色的,镶着淡紫色的珠子.
薰衣草在贫瘠的土壤中茁壮生长。

sentences.en: The air was fragrant with lavender.
The fragrance of lavender filled the room.
sentences.cn: 房间里充满了薰衣草的香味.

sentences.en: The plantation is one of the largest lavender farms in the world.
sentences.cn: 这里的农场是世界上最大的薰衣草农场之一。

sentences.en: When Julia came down, she was wearing a lavender dress.
sentences.cn: 朱丽娅从楼上下来时, 穿的是一身浅紫色的衣服.

sentences.en: With strong fragrant smell , lavender can soothe nerve and pain.
sentences.cn: 味道香浓可安定神经、止痛镇定.

trans.tran_en: a plant that has grey-green leaves and purple flowers with a strong pleasant smell
